bibl.title: Six Byzantine Documents.

Dialysis of Inheritance. Provenance unknown, sixth century. - 4. Inv. 21737 recto. Dialysis of Property. Provenance unknown, sixth/seventh century. - 5. Inv. 21750. Lease of Land and Loan of Wheat.
